title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, I need to first click on one of the interactive areas (such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame) before it starts working. This prevents me from immediately navigating through the Help view using the keyboard.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: The Help view should be starting in a state where it can be immediately navigated using the keyboard.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the Help view on Windows 2000. 2. Attempt to navigate through the Help view using the tab key. Verify that the tab key does not have any effect.
